issue.title: qual1 answer log entries not correct?  also, qual1 scoring formula.

content.raw:
`<a>` is alpha, and should always be 1. All color values should be in the range (0,1). 

The location of an LED must be in meters relative to the head frame of R5.

As GoRobotGo mentioned, LEDs will turn on and off. So, you will see some `<switch>` lines that are black `0 0 0` and some `<switch>` lines that have color.

Scores will be ranked based on the error of the reported positions and color values. The more accurate a reported answer is, the better your score.
content.html:
<a> is alpha, and should always be 1. All color values should be in the range (0,1).

The location of an LED must be in meters relative to the head frame of R5.

As GoRobotGo mentioned, LEDs will turn on and off. So, you will see some <switch> lines that are black 0 0 0 and some <switch> lines that have color.

Scores will be ranked based on the error of the reported positions and color values. The more accurate a reported answer is, the better your score.
